summary: Most core frontend requirements (routing/layout, Home sections, Collections grid + product details dialog with size selection and add-to-cart updating a header indicator, Contact form with client-side validation and success state, and a cohesive neutral fashion theme) appear implemented. The main gap is that the required generated image assets themselves are not evidenced in the diff summary. Additionally, several authentication/backend scaffolding files were added that were not requested for this marketing site scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated brand visuals as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (brand-logo.dim_512x512.png, hero-banner.dim_1920x900.png, lifestyle-banner.dim_1600x900.png) and use them in the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: UI components reference the generated asset paths, but the diff summary does not show the required image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (and omitted files are unspecified), so presence of the required assets cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty Motoko backend actor even though no backend work was requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on a frontend marketing site and does not request adding a backend; adding backend/main.mo is extra scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Added Internet Identity and actor/query scaffolding (useInternetIdentity, useActor, react-query setup, and an empty useQueries) without any requested auth or backend-driven functionality.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals include third-party auth and does not request implementing authentication flows or backend query plumbing for this marketing site.
